English: The early bird catches the worm., You have to be proactive if you want something.
Hungarian: A korai madár kapja el a férget.

English: After all, a raven doesn't pierce the eye of a raven., Colleagues / partners look after one another.
Hungarian: Hiszen a varjú nem bökdösi a varjú szemét.

English: One swallow doesn't make the summer., You can't really base any conclusions on one occurrence.
Hungarian: Egy fecske még nem csinál nyarat.
